member.name: M:uniteReportGeneratorSQL.com.garethwright.UniteReportsMSSQL.GetReportSQL(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Returns the SQL for a Unit-e report created in report generator, allowing development of custom tools whilst preserving editablity by non .net savvy staff
